3: The viral density shot up suddenly in this area...
I'm fine, my Inver-Device might not be adapting to it as quickly as yours...
It should be fine, this density increase rate shouldn't be critical.
But we should still check just in case. Liv, can you keep an eye out on the M.I.N.D. status of everyone here?
The waveform of Kamui's M.I.N.D. is... strange...
What do you mean 'strange'? Hey I didn't ask to be born like this!
Well done, Liv. You really are an exceptional Construct.
What'd you say?! No way I'm letting a tyrant like you show their face.
My Punishing Virus concentration has increased a lot lately... I can move around much longer now...
Do you know what this means?
I know I don't have much time left. I don't need you to tell me!
I know I'm living on borrowed time, you don't need to remind me!
